actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for the computation of benefits thereunder on the basis of the worker's three years of highest earnings.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends Title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to require that benefits be computed on the basis of the worker's three years of highest earnings, and for the recomputation of such benefits to reflect the changes required by this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for the computation of benefits thereunder on the basis of the worker's three years of highest earnings.
